content: Zhu Bajie is an allied character who will accompany you through much of your journey in Black Myth Wukong, however there will come a time when you are forced to defeat him in combat in order to progress the story. Upon reaching Chapter 4 in the Webbed Hollow, he will become bewitched, and will need your help to free himself of the lure of the Crimson Spider.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Zhu_Bajie_(Boss_Fight).md', within the main section titled 'Zhu Bajie (Boss Fight)'.
The content is as follows:
Zhu Bajie is an allied character who will accompany you through much of your journey in Black Myth Wukong, however there will come a time when you are forced to defeat him in combat in order to progress the story. Upon reaching Chapter 4 in the Webbed Hollow, he will become bewitched, and will need your help to free himself of the lure of the Crimson Spider.
